<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Processes a Constant recursively looking into elements of arrays, structs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and expressions to find a trivial pointer element that is located at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// given offset (relative to the beginning of the whole outer Constant).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Used for example from GlobalDCE to find an entry in a C++ vtable that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// matches a vcall offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// To support relative vtables, getPointerAtOffset can see through &quot;relative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pointers&quot;, i.e. (sub-)expressions of the form of:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @symbol = ... &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   i32 trunc (i64 sub (</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     i64 ptrtoint (&lt;type&gt; @target to i64), i64 ptrtoint (... @symbol to i64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ) to i32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For such (sub-)expressions, getPointerAtOffset returns the @target pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9ea314c7ebcfef667f1d7b67fe09c69">getPointerAtOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;TopLevelGlobal = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given a vtable and a specified offset, returns the function and the trivial</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// offset is a function or an alias to a function. Returns a pair of nullptr</span></CodeLine>
